typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as date,
		{Order ID} as integer,
		{Ship Date} as date,
		{Units Sold} as short,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		{Total Revenue} as double,
		{Total Cost} as double,
		{Total Profit} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 pivot(groupBy({Sales Channel}),
	pivotBy({Item Type}),
	{} = toDecimal(sum({Total Revenue}),16,2),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['itemsales.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
